#include "commo.h"
#include "../rcc/graph.h"
#include "../rcc/graph_marshaler.h"
#include "../command.h"
#include "../procedure.h"
#include "../command_marshaler.h"

#include "macros.h"
#include "marshallable.h"


namespace janus {

RaftCommo::RaftCommo(PollMgr* poll) : Communicator(poll) {
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent> RaftCommo::SendRequestVote(parid_t par_id,
                                siteid_t site_id,
                                uint64_t term,
                                uint64_t candidate_id,
                                uint64_t last_log_index,
                                uint64_t last_log_term,
                                uint64_t *ret1,
                                std::shared_ptr<rrr::IntEvent> *event_) {
  /*
   * Example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto event = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [ret1, event, event_](Future* fu) {
        /* this is a handler that will be invoked when the RPC returns */
        // uint64_t ret1;
        bool_t vote_granted;
        /* retrieve RPC return values in order */
        // uint64_t *temp_ret = ret1;
        fu->get_reply() >> *ret1;
        fu->get_reply() >> vote_granted;
        /* process the RPC response here */

        event->Set(1);

        if(vote_granted) (*event_)->Set((*event_)->get() + 1);

        // cout << (uint64_t)vote_granted << " : "  << event->get() << "*************************" << endl;
        // else event->Set(0);
      };
      /* Always use Call_Async(proxy, RPC name, RPC args..., fuattr)
      * to asynchronously invoke RPCs */


      Call_Async(proxy, RequestVote, term, candidate_id, last_log_index, last_log_term, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return event;
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent> RaftCommo::SendAppendEntries(parid_t par_id,
                                  siteid_t site_id,
                                  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd,
                                  uint64_t log_term,
                                  uint64_t term,
                                  uint64_t leader_id,
                                  uint64_t prev_log_index,
                                  uint64_t prev_log_term,
                                  uint64_t leader_commit,
                                  uint64_t *ret1,
                                  uint64_t* followerAppendOK,
                                  bool_t empty,
                                  std::shared_ptr<rrr::IntEvent> *appendentryevent_) {
  /*
   * More example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;


      fuattr.callback = [ret1, ev, followerAppendOK, appendentryevent_](Future* fu) {
        // uint64_t ret1;
        // bool_t followerAppendOK;
        // uint64_t *temp_ret = ret1;
        fu->get_reply() >> *ret1;
        fu->get_reply() >> *followerAppendOK;

        ev->Set(1);

        // if(*followerAppendOK == 2) (*appendentryevent_)->Set((*appendentryevent_)->get() + 1);
        // ev->Set(1);
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */

      MarshallDeputy md(cmd);
      // Call_Async(proxy, AppendEntries, md, term, leader_id, prev_log_index, prev_log_term, leader_commit, empty, fuattr);
      Call_Async(proxy, AppendEntries, md, log_term, term, leader_id, prev_log_index, prev_log_term, leader_commit, fuattr);
  }
  }
  return ev;
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent> RaftCommo::SendEmptyAppendEntries(parid_t par_id,
                                  siteid_t site_id,
                                  uint64_t term,
                                  uint64_t leader_id,
                                  uint64_t prev_log_index,
                                  uint64_t prev_log_term,
                                  uint64_t leader_commit,
                                  uint64_t* ret1,
                                  uint64_t* followerAppendOK) {
  /*
   * More example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [ret1, ev, followerAppendOK](Future* fu) {
        // bool_t followerAppendOK = false;
        fu->get_reply() >> *ret1;
        fu->get_reply() >> *followerAppendOK;
        ev->Set(1);
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      Call_Async(proxy, EmptyAppendEntries, term, leader_id, prev_log_index, prev_log_term, leader_commit, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}


shared_ptr<IntEvent> 
RaftCommo::SendString(parid_t par_id, siteid_t site_id, const string& msg, string* res) {
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [res,ev](Future* fu) {
        fu->get_reply() >> *res;
        ev->Set(1);
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      Call_Async(proxy, HelloRpc, msg, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}


} // namespace janus
